input: Who is the CEO?
output: SELECT employees.name FROM employees WHERE LOWER(employees.position) LIKE '%ceo%'

input: List all employees and their positions.
output: SELECT employees.name, employees.position FROM employees

input: When did Priya Patel join?
output: SELECT employees.join_date FROM employees WHERE LOWER(employees.name) LIKE '%priya patel%'

input: Show all employees who joined after 2022-01-01.
output: SELECT employees.name FROM employees WHERE employees.join_date > '2022-01-01'

input: What is the position of Rohan Mehta?
output: SELECT employees.position FROM employees WHERE LOWER(employees.name) LIKE '%rohan mehta%'

input: List all departments.
output: SELECT departments.name FROM departments

input: Which departments are located in New York?
output: SELECT departments.name FROM departments WHERE LOWER(departments.location) = 'new york'

input: What is the location of the HR department?
output: SELECT departments.location FROM departments WHERE LOWER(departments.name) = 'hr'

input: What is the department of Priyanka Sharma?
output: SELECT departments.name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.id WHERE LOWER(employees.name) LIKE '%priyanka sharma%'

input: List employees working in the Marketing department.
output: SELECT employees.name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.id WHERE LOWER(departments.name) = 'marketing'

output: SELECT employees.name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.id WHERE LOWER(departments.location) = 'san francisco'

input: What is the location of the department where Rahul Verma works?
output: SELECT departments.location FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.id WHERE LOWER(employees.name) LIKE '%rahul verma%'

input: List all employees and their department names.
output: SELECT employees.name, departments.name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.id

input: Who is the manager in the HR department?
output: SELECT employees.name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.id WHERE LOWER(departments.name) = 'hr' AND LOWER(employees.position) LIKE '%manager%'

input: Give me the names of all employees in New York.
output: SELECT employees.name FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department_id = departments.id WHERE LOWER(departments.location) = 'new york'

input: Who joined most recently?
output: SELECT employees.name FROM employees ORDER BY employees.join_date DESC LIMIT 1

input: List all department locations.
output: SELECT DISTINCT departments.location FROM departments
